fullText: The musical adaptation of the 1992 dark comedy starring Meryl Streep and Goldie Hawn has been transformed into a glitzy, effects-heavy spectacle that prioritizes visual dazzle over narrative coherence.
dtliExcerpt: The musical adaptation of the 1992 dark comedy starring Meryl Streep and Goldie Hawn has been transformed into a glitzy, effects-heavy spectacle that prioritizes visual dazzle over narrative coherence.
